title: You can have it all with lowered rents in a beautiful community!
map_address: 14107 E Kansas Pl near Leasing office
app_fee: $38 per person application fee (Credit and criminal background check)
posting_body: ['College Life – at Its Best', 'Welcome home to City Center Station', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'City Center Station', '14107 E Kansas Pl, Aurora , CO, 80012', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Ask about our move-in special!!', 'One Bedroom starting Rent $1499', 'Deposit on 1x1 $300.00 (O.A.C.)', 'Two bedroom staring rent $1699', 'Deposit on 2x1 $300.00 (O.A.C.)', 'Application Fee $38 ( per person)', 'Holding fee: $150 (Applied towards deposit upon move-in)', 'Washer and Dryer included', 'Residents pay all utilities', 'City Center Station in Aurora CO is in the perfect location offering 1 and 2 bedroom apartments.', 'This community offers ample parking - mature trees - beautiful landscaping - all in a park-like atmosphere.', 'Walking distance to shopping, restaurants, groceries, Etc.', 'Our team was voted the "Friendliest Apartment Community Staff in Aurora".', 'We are located near Denver International Airport - Aurora Mall/Century 16 Theater - and Buckley Air Force Base.', 'Apartment amenities include fireplaces - vaulted ceilings - and walk-in closets.', 'We are pet friendly - cats and dogs welcome!', 'Features', '- Washer and Dryer Included', '- Walk-in Closets', '- Fireplace', '- Open kitchen', '- Balcony/patio', '- Top floors have vaulted ceiling', '- Top floors have a sky light', '- Dishwasher', '- Bottom floors have extra closets', '- Sliding glass doors', 'Community Amenities', '- View Pool', '- Pet Friendly', '- View Courtyard', '- Pool', '- Ground Floor', '- Online Payments Available', '- Gated access', '- Top Floor', '- Playground', '- Corner Unit', '- Interior Unit', '- 24 hr Emergency Maintenance', '- Clubhouse', '- Fitness Center', '- Online Maintenance Requests', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats and dogs welcome.', '$200 pet deposit per pet and $250 non-refundable per pet.', '$35 monthly pet rent per pet.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'No weight limit.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Must be equal to or greater than 2.5 X the monthly rent.', 'If a co-signer is present they must make 4 X the monthly rent.', 'Driving Directions', 'Off Mississippi and Blackhawk', 'Office Hours', 'M - F: 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'S: 10:00am - 5:00pm', 'Su: Closed', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', '1W04bLV4B']
